item.title: Looking for innovative management reporter solutions
item.description: While I vaguely remember the show “In Search Of,” I’m currently focused on finding solutions to Management Reporter challenges rather than Bigfoot or the Bermuda Triangle. I’m seeking creative solutions, even if they’re unconventional, for two specific Management Reporter issues: Implementing Management Reporter in environments without a domain or Active Directory. Managing high-volume reporting, including generating reports for online viewing in the library and printing them for physical distribution. Although I know these aren’t currently supported, I’m interested in hearing from anyone who has developed workarounds or alternative approaches for their clients.
